title: Command Injection
description: The code constructs a command string using user input without proper sanitization or validation, which can lead to command injection.
fix: Sanitize and validate all user inputs before constructing command strings. Use safer alternatives like parameterized commands or avoid shell execution if possible.

reasoning.pattern: Concatenation of user input into a command string without validation.
reasoning.exploit_example: An attacker can inject malicious commands by manipulating the payload file path.
